info.title: Headless Admin Taxonomy
info.description: A Java client JAR is available for use with the group ID 'com.liferay', artifact ID 'com.liferay.headless.admin.taxonomy.client', and version '4.0.41'.

get.description: Retrieves the asset library's keyword by external reference code.

put.description: Updates the asset library's keyword with the given external reference code, or creates it if it not exists.

delete.description: Deletes the asset library's keyword by external reference code.

put.description: Replaces the keyword with the information sent in the request body. Any missing fields are deleted, unless required.

delete.description: Deletes the keyword and returns a 204 if the operation succeeds.

get.description: Retrieves the site's keyword by external reference code.

put.description: Updates the site's keyword with the given external reference code, or creates it if it not exists.

delete.description: Deletes the site's keyword by external reference code.

get.description: Retrieves a Site's keywords. Results can be paginated, filtered, searched, and sorted.

post.description: Inserts a new keyword in a Site.

put.description: Replaces the taxonomy category with the information sent in the request body. Any missing fields are deleted unless they are required.

delete.description: Deletes the taxonomy category and returns a 204 if the operation succeeds.

patch.description: Updates only the fields received in the request body. Other fields are left untouched.

get.description: Retrieves the site's taxonomy category by external reference code.

put.description: Updates the site's taxonomy category with the given external reference code, or creates it if it not exists.

delete.description: Deletes the site's taxonomy category by external reference code.

get.description: Retrieves a taxonomy category's child taxonomy categories. Results can be paginated, filtered, searched, and sorted.

post.description: Inserts a new child taxonomy category.

get.description: Retrieves a vocabulary's taxonomy categories. Results can be paginated, filtered, searched, and sorted.

post.description: Inserts a new taxonomy category in a taxonomy vocabulary.

get.description: Retrieves the asset library's taxonomy vocabulary by external reference code.

put.description: Updates the asset library's taxonomy vocabulary with the given external reference code, or creates it if it not exists.

delete.description: Deletes the asset library's taxonomy vocabulary by external reference code.

get.description: Retrieves the site's taxonomy vocabulary by external reference code.

put.description: Updates the site's taxonomy vocabulary with the given external reference code, or creates it if it not exists.

delete.description: Deletes the site's taxonomy vocabulary by external reference code.

put.description: Replaces the taxonomy vocabulary with the information sent in the request body. Any missing fields are deleted unless they are required.

delete.description: Deletes the taxonomy vocabulary and returns a 204 if the operation succeeds.

patch.description: Updates only the fields received in the request body. Any other fields are left untouched.

get.description: Retrieves a Site's taxonomy vocabularies. Results can be paginated, filtered, searched, and sorted.

post.description: Inserts a new taxonomy vocabulary in a Site.

get.description: Gets all taxonomy vocabularies that were created in CMS. Does not retrieve vocabularies created in DXP. CMS vocabularies are distinguished by having a `groupId = 0`.

post.description: Creates the asset library's taxonomy vocabulary in the given spaces.

AssetLibrary.description: A list of asset libraries (spaces) that this vocabulary is associated with.

additionalName.description: An additional name for the user. This can be used for a middle name.

image.description: A relative URL to the user's profile image.

profileURL.description: A relative URL to the user's profile.

assetLibraries.description: A list of asset libraries that are associated with this keyword.

dateModified.description: The keyword's most recent modification date.

keywordUsageCount.description: The number of times this keyword has been used with other assets.

siteExternalReferenceCode.description: The external reference code of the site to which this keyword is scoped.

siteId.description: The ID of the site to which this keyword is scoped.

subscribed.description: A flag that indicates whether the user making the requests is subscribed to this keyword.

Keyword.description: Represents a keyword that describes content. Properties follow the [keywords](https://schema.org/keywords) specification.

externalReferenceCode.description: The parent taxonomy category's external reference code.

ParentTaxonomyCategory.description: The category's parent category, if it exists.

externalReferenceCode.description: The parent category's `TaxonomyVocabulary` external reference code.

ParentTaxonomyVocabulary.description: The parent category's `TaxonomyVocabulary`, if such a parent category exists.

availableLanguages.description: A list of languages the category has a translation for.

items.description: A list of languages the category has a translation for.

dateModified.description: The category's most recent modification date.

numberOfTaxonomyCategories.description: The number of times this category has been used in other assets.

siteExternalReferenceCode.description: The external reference code of the site to which this category is scoped.

siteId.description: The ID of the site to which this category is scoped.

taxonomyVocabularyId.description: The `TaxonomyVocabulary` id, only if the category does not have a parent category.

TaxonomyCategory.description: Represents a category, which is a hierarchical classification that can be associated with particular asset types. Properties follow the [category](https://schema.org/category) specification.

externalReferenceCode.description: The taxonomy category's external reference code.

TaxonomyCategoryProperty.description: Key value pair to associate detailed information with a category.

required.description: A flag that marks if this type is required.

typeId.description: The classNameId of the asset's type.

AssetType.description: A list of asset types that can be associated with this vocabulary.

assetLibraries.description: A list of asset libraries (spaces) that this vocabulary is associated with.

assetTypes.description: A list of asset types that can be associated with this vocabulary.

availableLanguages.description: A list of languages the vocabulary has a translation for.

items.description: A list of languages the vocabulary has a translation for.

dateModified.description: The vocabulary's most recent modification date.

multiValued.description: Whether multiple categories can be associated with this vocabulary.

numberOfTaxonomyCategories.description: The number of categories that directly depend on this vocabulary.

siteExternalReferenceCode.description: The external reference code of the site to which this vocabulary is scoped.

siteId.description: The ID of the site to which this vocabulary is scoped.

TaxonomyVocabulary.description: Represents a vocabulary, which is a grouping of categories for a specific purpose (e.g., classification, sorting, etc.).
